name: backend-webscraping
description: Backend for web scraping with Puppeteer

scripts.build: PUPPETEER_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true npm install && apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main' >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable
